is.hgo2.reviewSearchHelper

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hgo2.reviewSearchHelper.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a util class for creating and extracting information from requests and responses
    Since:
    2013-03

    • Method Detail

      • addKeywordToPowerSearch

        public java.lang.String addKeywordToPowerSearch(java.lang.String keyword)
        Insert the keyword to the power search parameter value. Power search = keywords:%s and language:english
        Parameters:
        keyword - the search keyword to replace %s, this is either Productivity, Personal Productivity, Efficient, Effective(ness) or knowledge worker productivity
        Returns:
        the power search value with the keyword

      • getBrowseNodeIdName

        public java.lang.String getBrowseNodeIdName(ItemSearchResponse response,
                                   java.lang.String browseNodeId)
        Find a BrowseNodeId name by finding the name of the bin for that browseNodeId.
        Parameters:
        response - the response object of the ItemSearch with responseGroup = BinSearch
        browseNodeId - the id of a specific browseNode (category for a subject)
        Returns:
        string with the browseNodeId name

      • getBrowseNodeIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBrowseNodeIds(ItemSearchResponse response,
                                                java.lang.Boolean useExclusionCriteria)
        This fetches all the browseNodesIds in a bin list returned by an ItemSearch with responseGroup = BinSearch if the binItemCount is more than 100 and needs to be narrowed more.

        Exclusion criteria can also be applied, the exclusion criteria applied are defined in ExclusionCriteria.excludeBrowseNodeId(bin name). The exclusion criteria were analyzed manually.

        Parameters:
        response - the response object of the ItemSearch with responseGroup = BinSearch
        useExclusionCriteria - true=use the exclusion criteria specified in method ExclusionCriteria.excludeBrowseNodeId(bin name), false=no exclusion criteria
        Returns:
        List of browseNodeIds

      • getFormattedResultString

        public java.lang.String getFormattedResultString(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> results,
                                        java.lang.Boolean newline)
        To create a string with results
        Parameters:
        results - hashmap of values to create a string (key = description; value = the result value)
        newline - should append a newline between hashmap values
        Returns:
        string which can be printed in the console or in a text file

      • getRequest

        public java.lang.String getRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                          java.lang.String endpoint)
        This adds the signature to the request, canonicalizes (formats request, escape special characters etc...) and creates the URI request string from the request parameters params
        Parameters:
        params - hashmap with the parameters for the request (key=parameter name; value=parameter value)
        endpoint - the Amazon locale to search, either; CA, CN, DE, ES, FR, IN, IT, JP, UK, US. Be aware of different requirements for different locales
        Returns:
        the URI request string which can be sent to the Amazon API

      • getSignature

        public java.lang.String getSignature(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                            java.lang.String endpoint)
        Creates the signature string for the request to Amazon Product Advertising API. Uses hmac-sha256.
        Parameters:
        params - hashmap with the parameters for the request (key=parameter name; value=parameter value)
        endpoint - the Amazon locale to search, either; CA, CN, DE, ES, FR, IN, IT, JP, UK, US. Be aware of different requirements for different locales
        Returns:
        value for the signature parameter for the request with the parameters params

      • getStringWithBinListResults

        public void getStringWithBinListResults(ItemSearchResponse response)
        To create a string with the total results and pages of an ItemSearch with responseGroup = BinSearch as well as a list of all the bin names and their binItemCount.
        Parameters:
        response - the response object of the ItemSearch with responseGroup = BinSearch

      • getStringWithItemSearchResultsOnlyTitle

        public void getStringWithItemSearchResultsOnlyTitle(ItemSearchResponse itemSearchResponse)
        To create a string with the total results and pages of an ItemSearch as well as a list of book titles
        Parameters:
        itemSearchResponse - the response object from an ItemSearch

      • resultsMoreThanHundred

        public java.lang.Boolean resultsMoreThanHundred(java.math.BigInteger binItemCount)
        Compares the binItemCount to see if it is greater than 100.
        Parameters:
        binItemCount - the amount of result items in a specific bin
        Returns:
        true=binItemCount is greater than 100, false=binItemCount is equal or smaller than 100
